analysis.description:
Ownable.newOwner (/unique_chucks/46/0x3f9246c60f7406b1a5f5717d5182b67b67d14b15.sol#81) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- acceptOwnership (/unique_chucks/46/0x3f9246c60f7406b1a5f5717d5182b67b67d14b15.sol#107-114)

G8C.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/46/0x3f9246c60f7406b1a5f5717d5182b67b67d14b15.sol#199-201)
GANAPATIToken.totalSupply should be constant (/unique_chucks/46/0x3f9246c60f7406b1a5f5717d5182b67b67d14b15.sol#10-12)
Ownable.newOwner should be constant (/unique_chucks/46/0x3f9246c60f7406b1a5f5717d5182b67b67d14b15.sol#81)

Deprecated standard detected @ /unique_chucks/46/0x3f9246c60f7406b1a5f5717d5182b67b67d14b15.sol:
	- Usage of "sha3()" should be replaced with "keccak256()"
